text: The Vicar of Dibley is a British sitcom that was shown on BBC One between 1994 and 2007. It starred Dawn French as Geraldine Granger, the new female vicar of Dibley, Oxfordshire. == Other websites == * Category:1994 British television series debuts Category:2007 British television series endings Category:1990s British sitcoms Category:2000s British sitcoms Category:BBC television sitcoms Category:Oxfordshire Category:English-language television programs
title: The Vicar of Dibley
